# Change Approval and Risk Ownership

Change approval determines whether risk
is accepted on behalf of the organization.

## What Change Approval Represents
- Authorization to modify production systems
- Acceptance of potential failure impact
- Assignment of accountability

## Why Teams Consider AI Assistance
- Faster analysis of change details
- Identification of recurring risk patterns
- Reduction of approval bottlenecks

## Known Operational Risks
- Risk acceptance without authority
- Diffused accountability for failures
- Over-reliance on automated judgment
- Erosion of formal approval controls

This document provides context only.
It does not define acceptable approval boundaries.
